title: Ticket #3219: allow condor_qedit to log, but not do it by default.
description:
Updating the user log by default can cause numerous performance issues due to locking and update code.

commit 7407ad7860271e52943e457e81aab92bca60dff7

updated to log for every qedit.

Proposal is to add a '-log' to the command line to enable logging, otherwise off by default.
